extension_description.message: Tumọ ọrọ ti o yan lori oju-iwe wẹẹbu ki o yipada si ọna kika ti a pato.

turn_off_description.message: Bọtini itumọ yoo gbejade ni gbogbo igba ti ọrọ ba yan

turn_on_description.message: Bọtini itumọ kii yoo han nigbati ọrọ ba yan ṣugbọn o tun le tumọ nipa tite aami Pro Tumọ ni ọpa irinṣẹ

auto_switch.message: Yipada ni aladaaṣe si ede ibi-afẹde keji

auto_switch_description.message: Nigbati ọrọ ti o yan ba jẹ ede ibi-afẹde aiyipada, tumọ si ede ibi-afẹde keji

target_format_description.message: Yan ọna kika ibi-afẹde aiyipada, ọna kika le jẹ iyipada ninu nronu itumọ

auto_set_format_description.message: Nigbati ọna kika ba yipada ni nronu itumọ, ṣeto ọna kika ti o yan si ọna kika aiyipada

format_and_order_description.message: Awọn ọran kika ti o le jẹ iyipada ninu nronu itumọ ati aṣẹ ifihan

translate_button_on_description.message: Bọtini itumọ yoo gbejade ni gbogbo igba ti ọrọ ba yan

translate_button_off_description.message: Bọtini itumọ kii yoo han nigbati ọrọ ba yan ṣugbọn o tun le tumọ nipa tite aami Pro Tumọ ni ọpa irinṣẹ
